textSub.name: para1
textSub.string: What's this? You've lost your way and stumbled into really\n deep waters! Can you find your way back? It's pretty\n scary out here!

textSub.name: para2
textSub.string:
Tail Credit:
 Don't forget that you can bite the tails of some big
 fish. When you see the hazard sign, get ready to snack!
